thread.title: Yankees' CC Sabathia praised on Twitter for decision to enter alcohol rehab
thread.title_full: Yankees' CC Sabathia praised on Twitter for decision to enter alcohol rehab

author: Mike Rosenstein | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: Yankees' CC Sabathia praised on Twitter for decision to enter alcohol rehab
text: — Jerry Crasnick (@jcrasnick) October 5, 2015 Always really enjoy covering @CC_Sabathia . Impressed w/him - & the @Yankees - again today. This can't have been easy. pic.twitter.com/QJSeY7yZkq — Rachel Nichols (@Rachel__Nichols) October 5, 2015 Keep your head up @CC_Sabathia & keep pushing. pic.twitter.com/v4F9LsVdla — Stephen A Smith (@stephenasmith) October 5, 2015 Instead of questioning the timing of Sabathia's decision, consider how much pain he must be in to make such a decision at this time. #NYY — Matt Yallof (@MattYallofMLB) October 5, 2015 Good luck to CC Sabathia. — Robin Lundberg (@robinlundberg) October 5, 2015 CC Sabathia has been straightforward, honest and stand-up in my two years of covering the Yankees. Wishing him the best. — Brendan Kuty (@BrendanKutyNJ) October 5, 2015 Big man makes a big move for himself and his family! Good for you and best of luck CC! — John Flaherty (@flash17yes) October 5, 2015 Major, major props to CC Sabathia for taking the step today, not tomorrow, not after playoffs, to get the help he needs now ❤️ — Kerith Burke (@KerithBurke) October 5, 2015 Addiction is a horrible disease. Glad he's getting help. https://t.co/BCVOFshIHs
